entity.name: Greg Abbott
entity.description: US Governor of Texas, Greg Abbott

text: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott says that a month of the key COVID-19 metrics trends moving rapidly in the wrong direction does not warrant new statewide restrictions. If it happens for another month, it probably will.
